verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G882>Achaia:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> be <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G3628>mercies,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3874>comfort;<s%>

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G3870>comforts<s%> us in <S%G3650>all<s%> our <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> that we may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G3870>comfort<s%> them which are in <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G2347>trouble,<s%> by the <S%G3874>comfort<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> we ourselves are <S%G3870>comforted<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For as the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> in us, <S%G3779>so<s%> our <S%G3874>consolation<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4052>abounds<s%> by <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G2346>afflicted,<s%> it is for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3874>consolation<s%> and <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1754>effectual<s%> in the <S%G5281>enduring<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer:<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> it is for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3874>consolation<s%> and <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

And our <S%G1680>hope<s%> of you is <S%G949>steadfast,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing,<s%> that as you are <S%G2844>partakers<s%> of the <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall you be <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G3874>consolation.<s%>

For we <S%G2309>would<s%> not, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> have you <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of our <S%G2347>trouble<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to us in <S%G773>Asia,<s%> that we were <S%G916>pressed<s%> out of <S%G5236>measure,<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G1411>strength,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that we <S%G1820>despaired<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> of <S%G2198>life:<s%>

But we <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G610>sentence<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> in <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> that we should not <S%G3982>trust<s%> in <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> but in <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1453>raises<s%> the <S%G3498>dead:<s%>

Who <S%G4506>delivered<s%> us from <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G5082>great<s%> a <S%G2288>death,<s%> and does <S%G4506>deliver:<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G1679>trust<s%> that he will <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4506>deliver<s%> us;

You <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4943>helping<s%> <S%G4943>together<s%> by <S%G1162>prayer<s%> for us, that for the <S%G5486>gift<s%> bestowed on us by the means of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4383>persons<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> may be given by <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5228>on<s%> our <S%G5228>behalf.<s%>

For our <S%G2746>rejoicing<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of our <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> that in <S%G572>simplicity<s%> and <S%G2316>godly<s%> <S%G1505>sincerity,<s%> not with <S%G4559>fleshly<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> but by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> we have had our <S%G390>conversation<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> to <S%G4314>you-ward<s%> <S%G5209><s%>.

For we <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> things to you, <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1921>acknowledge;<s%> and I <S%G1679>trust<s%> you shall <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to the <S%G5056>end;<s%>

As <S%G2532>also<s%> you have <S%G1922>acknowledged<s%> us in <S%G3313>part,<s%> that we are <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2745>rejoicing,<s%> <S%G2509>even<s%> as you <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G2257>our's<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And in <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> I was <S%G1014>minded<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G4386>before,<s%> that you might <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5485>benefit;<s%>

And to <S%G1330>pass<s%> by you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> and to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> out of <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> to you, and of you to be <S%G4311>brought<s%> on my <S%G4311>way<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea.<s%>

When I <S%G3767>therefore<s%> was <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G1011>minded,<s%> did I <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G1644>lightness?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the things that I <S%G1011>purpose,<s%> do I <S%G1011>purpose<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> that with me there should be <S%G3483>yes<s%> <S%G3483>yes,<s%> and <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3756>no?<s%>
But as <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>true,<s%> our <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> you was not <S%G3483>yes<s%> and <S%G3756>no.<s%>

For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you by us, even by me and <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus,<s%> was not <S%G3483>yes<s%> and <S%G3756>no,<s%> but in him was <S%G3483>yes.<s%>
For <S%G3745>all<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in him are <S%G3483>yes,<s%> and in him <S%G281>Amen,<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> by us.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> he which <S%G950>establishes<s%> us with you in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and has <S%G5548>anointed<s%> us, is <S%G2316>God;<s%>
<S%G3588>Who<s%> has <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4972>sealed<s%> us, and <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G728>earnest<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in our <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> I <S%G1941>call<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for a <S%G3144>record<s%> on my <S%G5590>soul,<s%> that to <S%G5339>spare<s%> you I <S%G2064>came<s%> not as <S%G3765>yet<s%> to <S%G2882>Corinth.<s%>

Not for that we have <S%G2961>dominion<s%> over <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> but are <S%G4904>helpers<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy:<s%> for by <S%G4102>faith<s%> you <S%G2476>stand.<s%>
